thread.title: Survey: Which NFL fans are the most annoying?
thread.title_full: Survey: Which NFL fans are the most annoying?

title: Survey: Which NFL fans are the most annoying?
text:
According to a new survey, Patriots fans are pretty annoying. 
But not the most annoying fans in the NFL. 
That "honor" goes to fans of the Seattle Seahawks. 
The survey said New Englanders are the second-most annoying fans in the National Football League. 
The Patriots certainly aren't shy about encouraging their fans. On Twitter Thursday morning, the Patriots reminded the world of the infamous "butt fumble," ahead of their key matchup against the Jets this weekend. Ouch. 
The tweet was deleted within hours, but had already gone viral. Patriots troll Jets with #TBT buttfumble tweet (they've since deleted it). #SMsports https://t.co/duoI3Wosbc pic.twitter.com/hWmJuId2lH â€” Fieldhouse Media (@fieldhousemedia) October 22, 2015 
The fans of the Cowboys, Steelers and Eagles rounded out the top five. 
Could there be some jealously in play here?
